data.title: Sienna Miller and Jude Law: Truth behind the split
data.meta_description: SIENNA MILLER’S split with JUDE LAW may have come as a shock to us mere mortals – but pals say it has been waiting to happen ever since they reunited.
data.text:
SIENNA MILLER’S split with JUDE LAW may have come as a shock to us mere mortals – but pals say it has been waiting to happen ever since they reunited.

I can reveal that the main reason for the separation is that Sienna, 29, doesn’t want to calm down and enter a more quiet life with Jude, 38.

“Jude’s always had a problem with the age gap,” says a friend. “Sienna loves to party and have a pretty wild time. Jude likes staying in. He doesn’t want to be out until all hours.

“Sienna just wasn’t on the same wavelength – so she decided it was better to call it a day.”

From what my sources tell me, Jude – currently filming action thriller Contagion in San Francisco – is cut up at the way things have turned out. “He didn’t think their ­relationship would end,” says my mole. I wish Sienna well – she’s hot property now. Gentlemen, start your ­engines...
